body: Added Note: Forgot to mention that I have Configure → Settings → User-Interface → “Use selected item as chat bar target” enabled.

Is your issue that stuff typed in the input field does not show up?

Or is it that it still only targets the channel you are in?

If it's the latter, are you positively sure the option is really enabled?

I think this "use selected item as chat bar target" option should be enabled by default. This was the behavior of 1.2.3, and having that change on users when they upgrade is not very user friendly at all.
